text: Ðis synt þa landes meære to bryning tune.
Ærest on heafd beorh þonne on wyrt walan on þæs hagan ende.
Þonne andlang hagan þær fisces burna and alaburna togædre scotaþ.
Þonne of alaburnan ut on herred snad.
And swa norþ to herpaþe andlang herpaþes to þære efisc.

Þonen eft on wyrtwalen to crohhamme þonne on hunnes wylle þonne west be yfre þæt hit sticaþ on weala brucge þonne þaer ut on cynetan andlang cynetan on myþford þonne on middel ea þæt swa on beferige þonne on fyrsige of dune andlang ea.
Þær ala burna scyt ut on cynetan.
Þonne up andlang alaburnan on scealdan ford þonon andlang hagan ut on heaþ felda swa to herpaþe andlang herpaþes to imman beorge of imman beorge eft on heafod beorge.
